posts.title: Bacon Bandaids
posts.content: Very few people know of the amazing healing powers that bacon possesses. Bacon is so powerful, in fact, that they now make bacon bandaids to help quickly heal your open cuts and wounds. These novelty bacon bandaids are functional and tasty!

posts.title: Ravioli Rolling Pin
posts.content: Expand your culinary horizon as you utilize the ravioli rolling pin to add master pasta maker to your repertoire. This unique beechwood rolling pin measures 24″ wide and comes outfitted with specially made ridges designed to create perfect raviolis.

posts.title: Whiteboard Wall Clock
posts.content: Manage your time more efficiently by visualizing your hectic workday on the face of the whiteboard wall clock. This fully functional clock features a whiteboard backdrop that you can write your daily schedule onto using a magic marker.

posts.title: Reserved Beach Towel
posts.content: Ensure no one takes your spot when you leave it momentarily unattended by laying out this “reserved” beach towel. The towel measures 60 x 30 inches and is made from 100% cotton to ensure a soft feel that won’t irritate sun-kissed skin.

posts.title: Mini Ice Cream Sandwich Maker
posts.content: Create home made mini ice cream sandwiches with this cute ice cream maker that uses no batteries; simply gather your favorite store bought ingredients and add a dash of gluttony and you’ll be making your own custom mini ice cream sandwiches in no time!

posts.title: Spaceship 3D Cookie Cutters
posts.content: Send your taste buds on a delicious interplanetary journey when you bite into a 3D spaceship cookie. With the spaceship 3D cookie cutters your treats will blast off the baking pan and embark on a heroic mission to land on the surface of your tongue.

posts.title: Castle Cake Mold
posts.content: Build an empire of sweets your kids will go crazy for using this castle cake mold. With this unique non-stick bundt pan, you’ll be able to enjoy professional bakery quality cakes with minimal effort and for a fraction of the price.

posts.title: You Shall Not Pass Car Sticker
posts.content: Keep drivers from cutting you off on the road with the help of Gandalf and the “You Shall Not Pass” car sticker. This amusing vinyl decal is made to stand up to the elements and comes available in whatever color tickles your fancy. Slow down, you fools!

posts.title: Composition Book iPad Cover
posts.content: Kick it old school by protecting your tablet using the composition book iPad cover. This stylish covers offers complete front and back protection while allowing full access to the touchscreen. Closing it up transforms your iPad back to a nostalgic composition book.

posts.title: Science Flask Salt and Pepper Shakers
posts.content: Give your kitchen a geeky twist by storing your salt and pepper in these scientific flask shakers. These four inch tall Erlenmeyer flask containers are equipped with a periodic table styled label and a black rubber stopper to prevent the salt and pepper from spilling.

posts.title: Mattel Classic Football Keychain
posts.content: Play your favorite 70s era football game whenever you want by carrying this Mattel classic football game on your keychain. Measuring 2.75″ x 1.6″, this ultra compact game functions just like the original that you remember from your childhood.

posts.title: Wine Glass Holder Necklace
posts.content: Stop spilling your drink like a sloppy drunk during your next drinking binge by wearing with this wine glass holder necklace. A sturdy neoprene case nestles your glass, freeing up your hands as your glass securely dangles from the removable straps.
